resources.string: Generate party with the selected heroes
Every party needs a name.\nYour friends need to know which party to join and I need a name to store party data you can later retrieve.
Tell your friends to join your party from the main menu. Their PCs will appear below.
Looks like someone else is creating a party with the same name. I will use the name you have provided but I must use a different one to let your friends join. Tell them to look for
Looks like the network cannot be initialized.\nI need to access the network so I can talk to other devices. No personal information will be sent.
Could not start network discovery (reason: %1).\\nThis is required.
Could not install network service (reason: %1).\\nThis is required so players can join your party.
It looks like the system is jugglying with network state. I am not currently able to cope with that.\nHopefully this is a transient error, it is perhaps worth trying again.
